mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM WHEN LENGTH(C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 5 THEN SUBSTR(C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,5,1) END AS VHC_DRV_CAFFNM , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-','')) = 11 or LENGTH(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-',''))= 12 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.DRV_CAFF_TELNO,'-',''),8,4) END AS DRV_CAFF_TELNO , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.BRWR_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-','')) = 11 or LENGTH(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-','')) = 12 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(C.BRWR_MPNO,'-',''),8,4) END AS BRWR_MPNO /* 차주휴대전화번호 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 5 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,5,1) END AS FTSNM , B.DONGUP || '' || B.DONGBW AS ADR /* 농가주소 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) = 11 or LENGTH(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) = 12 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),8,4) END AS CUS_MPNO /* 농가 휴대폰번호 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN B.OHSE_TELNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-','')) = 11 or LENGTH(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-','')) = 12 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),8,4) END AS OHSE_TELNO /* 농가 집전화번호 */ , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 축산개체관리번호 */ , D.INDV_SEX_C /* 개체성별코드 */ , A.AUC_PRG_SQ /* 경매진행순서 */ , A.COW_SOG_WT /* 우출하중량 */ , B.RMK_CNTN /* 수송비고 */ , A.RMK_CNTN AS RMK_CNTN2 , B.FHS_ID_NO FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_VHC C , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV D WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} END /* 경매대상구분코드 */ AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND (C.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM = #{vhc_drv_caffnm} OR #{vhc_drv_caffnm} is null) AND A.LED_SQNO = '1' AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.VHC_SHRT_C = C.VHC_SHRT_C AND A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = D.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = D.SRA_SRS_DSC UNION ALL SELECT '' AS VHC_DRV_CAFFNM /* 수송자명 */ , '' AS DRV_CAFF_TELNO /* 수송자전화번호 */ , '' AS BRWR_MPNO /* 차주휴대전화번호 */ , CASE WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(B.FTSNM) = 5 THEN SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(B.FTSNM,5,1) END AS FTSNM /* 농가명 */ , B.DONGUP || '' || B.DONGBW AS ADR /* 농가주소 */ , CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) = 11 or LENGTH(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) = 12 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),8,4) END AS CUS_MPNO /* 농가 휴대폰번호 */ , CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '***' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-','')) = 11 or LENGTH(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-','')) = 12 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-' || '****' || '-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(B.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),8,4) END AS OHSE_TELNO /* 농가 집전화번호 */ , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ , A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 축산개체관리번호 */ , D.INDV_SEX_C /* 개체성별코드 */ , A.AUC_PRG_SQ /* 경매진행순서 */ , A.COW_SOG_WT /* 우출하중량 */ , B.RMK_CNTN /* 수송비고 */ , A.RMK_CNTN AS RMK_CNTN2 , B.FHS_ID_NO FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV D WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND 1 = (CASE WHEN #{vhc_drv_caffnm} is null THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) AND A.LED_SQNO = '1' AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.TRPCS_PY_YN = '1' AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO AND A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = D.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = D.SRA_SRS_DSC ORDER BY VHC_DRV_CAFFNM, ADR, FTSNM ;
